summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PDF export functionality. Successfully verified that switching from html2pdf.js to window.print() with @media print CSS has resolved the huge gap issue. All features tested and working correctly.
passed_tests: Normal web view loads with correct two-column layout
All main sections (Hero, Contact, Personal Info, Skills, Languages, About, Experience, Education) visible
Export PDF button present and triggers window.print()
Print media emulation: header/footer/buttons hidden correctly
Print media emulation: two-column grid layout maintained (200px 1fr)
Print media emulation: sidebar cards remain visible
Print media emulation: reasonable 48px gap between 'O meni' and 'Radno iskustvo' (no huge gap)
CSS grid working properly in print mode
